summary:
Get 20% OFF on your first order - Subscribe to our newsletter and get your coupon!

 Witness your NFTs evolve, engage, & appreciate in value over time. - It's not just an investment; it's a journey into the future of digital interaction. Take the leap with Evelon, and be a part of the revolution in the world of NFTs.

 You are in control - Discover the power of streamlined asset management with Evelon's user-friendly NFT Management Panel. Our intuitive dashboard allows you to easily create, track, and manage your dynamic NFTs, granting you the ability to tweak traits, modify attributes, and watch as your assets evolve. Simplifying complex processes into a few clicks, we're putting the control back in your hands.

 Embrace the Power of Evolving NFTs - With Evelon, your NFTs are more than static digital assets - they are evolving entities. Utilizing cutting-edge AI technology, our NFTs acquire unique properties and features over time, enhancing their utility and value. Step into a world where every NFT tells a dynamic story.

 Unlock value with EVLN tokens - EVLN, our native token, serves as the fuel to our dynamic NFT ecosystem, opening doors to a plethora of utilities and benefits. From facilitating transactions to participating in governance, EVLN tokens place you at the heart of our vibrant community. Experience unparalleled advantages in NFT creation, trading, and more, with EVLN tokens.

 About our product - Embrace the Power of Evolving NFTs

No more complex technicalities or endless waiting. Start monetizing your art, music, or any digital asset with lightning speed.

 Design with AI - Unleash your creativity like never before with Evelon's AI-powered NFT design. Our platform harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to help you create stunning and unique NFTs effortlessly.

 Metadata - Take control of your NFTs with Evelon's metadata and properties customization. Set the stage for your digital masterpieces by defining their unique attributes and characteristics.

 Launch - Time is precious, and we value yours. With Evelon, you can launch your NFTs in just a few minutes. Our streamlined platform simplifies the entire process, allowing you to mint and launch your digital creations swiftly and effortlessly.

 We bring solutions to make life easier for our customers. - We have considered our solutions to support every stage of your growth.

 Happy Customers - Don't take our word for it. See what customers are saying about us.

 Evelon empowers creators - Move beyond mere collectibles and harness practical value from NFTs. We enable real-world NFT applications in gaming, collectibles, real estate, identity management, and supply chain tracking, transforming digital assets into practical, valuable, and dynamic solutions.

 Insights in your data - NFT analytics with speed, accuracy, and reliability at your fingertip.

 Intuitive interface - We designed an interface that works as you would expect.

 Engage - Connect with your NFT holders and reward them with royalties.

 Washtrade detection - An AI-based wash trading detection solution built-in.

 Price estimation - An accurate method of determining fair values for NFT assets using AI.

 Your personal AI assistant - The assistant helps you mint, launch, sell and promote your NFTs.

 Roadmap - Follow our socials and get the latest updates and news.

 Q3 - Public beta launch

Launch the platform in public beta and invite our partners and community to test and provide feedback.

 Q4 - IDOs

Launch our public IDOs on various platforms, such as Kommunitas, Gagarin, TrustFi and TorkPad.

 Q4 - Token Launch

Launch our token on Ethereum. The token unlocks rewards, governance and premium features on the platform.

 Q4 - Mainnet launch

Launch the platform on Ethereum(L1) and on various L2 blockchains to scale and reduce platform fees.

 Q4 - Grants

Launch the governance portal. EVLN holders can vote on grant proposals, empowering the ecosystem and direction of Evelon.

 Customer Satisfaction - We make your spending stress-free for you to have the perfect control.
